data.message: Thank you for believing in yourself so much that you got back up every time they knocked you down.  Thank you for being the example that the rest of us may look to when it's our turn to be on the floor and we're so damn tired.  Thank you for literally getting ME up off of that floor--again and again and...  We are here to defy the system that is wrong, to push against it until it changes, and we are stronger when we are together. 🙏 Your example is appreciated immensely.
